typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	julianfilename as string
}
source(output(
		col1 as string,
		col2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'SourceFileName') ~> SrcPlaceHolder
source(output(
		juliandate as integer,
		universaldate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from t_date_lkup',
	format: 'query') ~> source1
SrcPlaceHolder derive(JulianDatePortionDerived = replace(substring($julianfilename,  instr($julianfilename,toString(year(toDate(currentTimestamp()))))+4),'.csv','')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, source1 lookup(toInteger(JulianDatePortionDerived) == juliandate,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(juliandate, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 sink(input(
		sourcefilename as string,
		outputfolder as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['stagingfile.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		sourcefilename = SourceFileName,
		outputfolder = universaldate
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink2
